short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to rest your eyes every 20 minutes for 20 seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension counts down 20 minutes and opens up a window, which in turn counts down 20 seconds during which you should give your eyes a rest and look away from your computer.
